header.title: Dynamical System - Scheffran Two Actor - Xholon App

section.title: What is it
section.p: This model implements a dynamical system based on a STELLA model by Jurgen Scheffran and Bruce Hannon. This demonstrates how to model dynamical systems using Xholon. I have previously implemented the same model using Vensim.

ol.li: Run the Java application through the Xhn GUI (org.primordion.xholon.app.Xhn.java), and select File --> Open --> dynsys --> ScheffranTwoActor --> ScheffranTwoActor_xhn.xml.
Expand the Controller node in the tree.

If you have JFreeChart installed, and if you have selected "JFreeChart" as the value of the UseDataPlotter parameter in ScheffranTwoActor_xhn.xml, you should see a chart showing the Value series over time. If you don't have JFreeChart installed, then change the value of UseDataPlotter to "gnuplot", and look at the results that are saved to a .csv file in the statistics folder. If you have gnuplot installed, it can read the .plt script in the statistics folder to produce a displayable .png file from the .csv file, that should look similar to the one below.
